### How to install

```
pip install zcommon4py # or pip3
```

### Logger

```python
from zcommon4py import ZLogger

if __name__ == "__main__":
    logger = ZLogger("logger")
    logger.debug("debug")
    logger.info("info")
    logger.warning("warning")
    logger.error("error")
```
